title: 2 font ids required
content:
Hi,

Will anyone be kind enough to identify these fonts.

The 2nd one is the ever so popular Ampersand, but I aren’t exactly sure what typeface it belongs to.

Cheers

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105629/http:/typophile.com/files/167057714_952b298d03_o.jpg) | 21.15 KB |
| [2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090503105629/http:/typophile.com/files/2_22.jpg) | 45.68 KB |
author: rdc_1985

comments.content:
1.jpg looks like it could be hand-drawn. House Slant will get you close.

The ampersand in 2.jpg looks like Adobe Caslon 540 Italic.

- Lex
Wow, if that’s really Caslon 540, it’s pretty badly maltreated. I mean boldened :)
